hints.label: lem-entropy-l1-bound
hints.title: Entropy $L^1$ Bound
hints.raw_directive:
4453: **Lemma (Entropy moment bound)**:
4454: 
4455: :::{prf:lemma} Entropy $L^1$ Bound
4456: :label: lem-entropy-l1-bound
4457: 
4458: For any $\rho, \rho_\infty \in \mathcal{P}(\Omega)$:
4459: 
4460: $$
4461: \int \rho \left|\log \frac{\rho}{\rho_\infty}\right| \le 2 D_{\text{KL}}(\rho \| \rho_\infty) + C_{\text{const}}
4462: 
4463: $$
4464:
